name: Sammy Da Snail
description:
Space to jump

Left and Right arrow keys to move!

Survive 3 levels for 1 minute of progressively increasing difficulty to help Sammy impress the ladies!!

Enjoy my first ever GameJame submission!!

Tell me your thoughts! what you liked, what you didn't and where you think I could improve. It's not perfect, that's for sure, but I am happy with what I was able to accomplish with my first game. Looking forward to submitting again in the future! I got my work cut out for me to keep up with you guys!! I did get some pixel distortion when I created my assets in Unity if anyone know how to improve that, that would be great!!

Skills/features to improve for future GameJams:

fix pixel distortion

move enemies

more enemy variety/level variety

clear indication of level progression

Implement particle system feature
